column1: axolotl (a mexican salamander with a unique ability to regrow its limbs)
aye aye (a type of lemur found in madagascar, known for its elongated middle finger used to tap on trees to find insects)
dik dik (small antelope species native to africa, known for their distinctive black markings and unique call)
quetzal (a colorful bird species found in central and south america, known for their long tails and iridescent feathers)
tarsier (small primates native to southeast asia, known for their large eyes, long fingers, and jumping ability)
